transcript.text: [Music]
tonight I'm gonna tell you a little bit
about why I do what I do and if you want
to learn more about why I do what I do
you're gonna have to come over here and
check out the new channel I'm launching
called Just In Time podcast now this is
gonna be a channel where I post
interviews with friends and and in
sources that I've put together over the
last few years and I really want to make
this a channel that's about kind of
giving you more of a behind-the-scenes
look at what's going on here and just a
forum talk and also I want to have this
alternate venue to kind of post the
long-form interviews that I want to do
with so many people so I hope you guys
really enjoy this channel and all I'm
asking you to do is to go into your
browser at YouTube type just in time
that's tym e one-word podcast search
this channel when you find it go hit the
big red subscribe button that will help
this channel out more you guys can ever
imagine and what we're gonna do is we're
gonna actually focus on this channel
with just having content that that
highlights people who I think are
interesting to have conversations with
and if you guys want more of that here's
a sneak peek at what you're gonna get
when you come over to Just In Time
podcasts here's an excerpt from the
first video I'm gonna be posting on this
channel which is basically going to be
entitled why I do what I do why do I do
this
well it's a question I get asked often
and obviously the the simplest answer
for me which I always tell everyone is I
do this because I love God I'm an
evangelist I've been called to spread
his word and basically I've been blessed
with a platform where I have a huge
amount of people who are able to hear my
words on a regular basis and my promise
to God is to put him first and to spread
his word and to live my life that way
because I understand that for myself and
my family that that's the only way to
live that to me is is is my most
important driving motivation for what I
do
and that's why I say I love God I love
my family and I love my country and I
work very hard to make sure I honor God
and then he'll and then ask God to help
me honor my family in my country so that
that's the reason why I do it but
there's actually a story behind it
[Music]
[Applause]
[Applause]
[Music]
